s3464: Year 33: Raided Zheng; Jin defeated us at Xiao.
s3471: Zheng Mu Gong Lan, first year. Qin raided us; Xian Gao deceived them.
s3479: Year 2: Attacked Wei; Wei attacked us.
s3480: Year 34: The Xiao defeated generals returned; the duke restored their offices.
s3481: Year 46: The king wanted to kill the crown prince and establish Zhi; the crown prince was afraid and together with tutor Pan Chong killed the king. The king wanted to eat bear paw and die, but they did not listen. Self-established as king.
s3483: Year 9: Jin attacked us; we attacked Jin.
s3495: Year 3: Qin avenged our Xiao defeat; defeated us at Wang.
s3496: Year 35: Attacked Jin to avenge Xiao; defeated us at Wang.
s3509: Year 3: The duke went to Jin.
s3511: Year 4: Qin attacked us, took Wang City; we did not go out.
s3512: Year 36: With Meng Ming and others attacked Jin; Jin did not dare come out.
s3527: Year 5: Attacked Qin, surrounded Mai and Xin City.
s3528: Year 37: Jin attacked us, surrounded Mai and Xin City.
s3531: Year 12: The duke went to Jin.
s3543: Year 6: Zhao Cheng Zi, Luan Zhen Zi, Huo Bo, Jiu Ji all died.
s3559: Year 7: The duke died. Zhao Dun as crown prince was young, wanted to establish different ruler, feared execution, so established crown prince as Ling Gong.
s3560: Year 39: Mu Gong died. Buried with human sacrifices; those who died with him were 170 people; the gentleman criticized it, so not said 'died'.
s3578: Year 17: Gong Sun Gu killed Cheng Gong.
s3589: Year 8: The king sent Wei to request gold for burial; it was not ritual.
s3591: Year 2: Qin attacked us, took Wu City, avenged Ling Gu's battle.
